urls.title: Guidance published on new carbon capture technologies
urls.description: The new guidance outlines recommended techniques for carbon capture and supports the Government’s aim for the UK to become carbon net zero.

text:
Are you involved in industrial CO2 capture?

Do you want to help the UK reach Net Zero?

The Government wants to capture 10Mt of CO2 a year by 2030, and we have now published new guidance for recommended techniques for carbon capture.

urls.title: The State of the Urban Environment: How make cities Clean, Green and Just
urls.description: Global Action Plan will be hosting a joint online event with the Environment Agency on environmental justice on Tuesday 20 July at 11am. The event will launch the EA’s latest report on the State of the Urban Environment and include a major speech from the EA’s Chief Executive, Sir James Bevan.
